special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: DR. STRANGE
special_powers.description: Give Dr. Strange a free action if he began your turn on the map. Replace him with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: DEFENDERS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, if a character uses the Defenders team ability to replace its defense value with Dr. Strange's, you may reroll one of the attack dice.

special_powers.name: TELEPORTATION SPELL
special_powers.description: Dr. Strange can use Phasing/Teleport. When he does, he can carry up to 2 friendly characters, or 4 friendly characters if they all have the Defenders keyword.

special_powers.name: MARVEL KNIGHTS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose one: Characters using this trait have a minimum attack value of 10 or characters using this trait are wild cards.

special_powers.name: DEFENDERS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, if a character uses the Defenders team ability to replace its defense value with Hulk's, also modify that character's defense value by +1 if it is a close attack.

special_powers.name: LEAPING SMASH
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Leap/Climb. When he does, after actions resolve he can use Quake as a free action.

special_powers.name: DEFENDERS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, if a character uses the Defenders team ability to replace its defense value with Hawkeye's, also modify that character's defense value by +1 if it is a range attack.

special_powers.name: TIME FOR A COSTUME CHANGE!
special_powers.description: Give Wasp a free action if she began your turn on the map. Replace her with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: DENSITY SHIFT
special_powers.description: Give Vision a free action if he began your turn on the map. Replace him with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: BLACK PANTHER
special_powers.description: Give Black Panther a free action if he began your turn on the map. Replace him with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: MARVEL KNIGHTS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose one: Characters using this trait have a minimum attack value of 10 or characters using this trait are wild cards.

special_powers.name: UNBREAKABLE SKIN
special_powers.description: Luke Cage can use Invulnerability and Willpower. Penetrating damage dealt to Luke Cage can be reduced.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: PUNISHER
special_powers.description: Give Punisher a free action if he began your turn on the map. Replace him with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: MARVEL KNIGHTS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose one: Characters using this trait have a minimum attack value of 10 or characters using this trait are wild cards.

special_powers.name: ROCKET-PROPELLED GRENADE
special_powers.description: When Punisher hits a single opposing character with a range attack, instead of dealing normal damage, deal the target 4 damage and deal each character adjacent to the target 3 damage.

special_powers.name: SYSTEM REBOOT
special_powers.description: Once per game, Iron Man can use Regeneration, but only subtracts 1 from the result.

special_powers.name: RESPECTED LEADER
special_powers.description: Captain America can use Leadership, but succeeds on a 4-6. When he does, on a result of a 6, you may also remove an action token from each friendly character with the Avengers keyword within range.

special_powers.name: MARVEL KNIGHTS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose one: Characters using this trait have a minimum attack value of 10 or characters using this trait are wild cards.

special_powers.name: ELECTRICALLY-CHARGED TITANIUM WHIP
special_powers.description: When Whiplash makes an attack and hits, roll a d6. On a result of 4-6, place an action token on the hit target.

special_powers.name: FOR THE KING!
special_powers.description: If a friendly character named Black Panther is within 8 squares, Wakandan Warrior can use Precision Strike and Willpower.

special_powers.name: OUTNUMBER YOU FROM THE SHADOWS
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - If Hand Ninja occupies hindering terrain, he can use Empower.

special_powers.name: ATLANTIS RISING
special_powers.description: If a friendly character with the Atlantis and Ruler keywords is within 8 squares, Atlantean Warrior modifies his attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: ELEKTRA
special_powers.description: Give Elektra a free action if she began your turn on the map. Replace her with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: MARVEL KNIGHTS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose one: Characters using this trait have a minimum attack value of 10 or characters using this trait are wild cards.

special_powers.name: EFFORTLESSLY MOVING ACROSS THE BATTLEFIELD
special_powers.description: Elektra can use Sidestep and Stealth.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: BLACK PANTHER
special_powers.description: Give Black Panther a free action if he began your turn on the map. Replace him with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: DR. STRANGE
special_powers.description: Give Dr. Strange a free action if he began your turn on the map. Replace him with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: DEFENDERS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, if a character uses the Defenders team ability to replace its defense value with Dr. Strange's, reduce the damage dealt by an additional 1 if they have the Defenders keyword.

special_powers.name: STAY BEHIND MY MYSTICAL SHIELD
special_powers.description: Dr. Strange can use Defend. If an adjacent character takes damage from an attack, after actions resolve you may heal that character of 1 damage. If you do, roll a d6 and on a result of 1-3, deal 1 unavoidable damage to Dr. Strange.

special_powers.name: LEAVE HULK ALONE!
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, if Hulk was targeted with an attack since your last turn, place an Anger token on his card. If Hulk wasn't targeted with an attack since your last turn, remove an Anger token from his card. After placing or removing Anger tokens, if Hulk has 5 Anger tokens or more he is immediately KO'd.

special_powers.name: GRAY-SKINNED BEHEMOTH
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Super Strength.

special_powers.name: QUIVER FULL OF TRICKS
special_powers.description: Hawkeye begins the game with 5 Trick Arrow tokens on this card. Once per turn, you may remove a Trick Arrow token from this card and choose one of the following powers for Hawkeye to be able to use this turn: Energy Explosion, Penetrating/Psychic Blast or Incapacitate.

special_powers.name: TIME FOR A COSTUME CHANGE!
special_powers.description: Give Wasp a free action if she began your turn on the map. Replace her with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: A NATURAL LEADER
special_powers.description: Wasp can use Leadership as if she were 100 points. When she does and succeeds, add two actions to your action total instead of one.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: DENSITY SHIFT
special_powers.description: Give Vision a free action if he began your turn on the map. Replace him with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: PARRY
special_powers.description: When Swordsman or an adjacent friendly character would be hit by an opposing character that can use Blades/Claws/Fangs, roll 2d6. If your roll is equal or higher than the attack roll, the attack is evaded.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE TRAINING
special_powers.description: Black Widow can use Stealth.

special_powers.name: ALWAYS GETTING INTO TROUBLE, BUT MY FRIENDS ARE ALWAYS THERE TO BAIL ME OUT
special_powers.description: Karen Page can use Sidestep. UNIQUE MODIFIER - If she is within 3 squares of an opposing character, all friendly characters modify their attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: THE WORLD NEEDS TO KNOW: THAT YOU ARE THE ONE BEHIND ALL OF THIS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose an opposing character within 4 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn, that character can't use Mastermind or Shape Change..

special_powers.name: MARVEL KNIGHTS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose one: Characters using this trait have a minimum attack value of 10 or characters using this trait are wild cards.

special_powers.name: ENHANCED REFLEXES
special_powers.description: Black Panther can use Leap/Climb and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: PUNISHER
special_powers.description: Give Punisher a free action if he began your turn on the map. Replace him with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: MARVEL KNIGHTS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose one: Characters using this trait have a minimum attack value of 10 or characters using this trait are wild cards.

special_powers.name: SO, I GUESS ITS GONNA BE THE "UP CLOSE AND PERSONAL" ROUTE
special_powers.description: Punisher can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When he does, if the result of his d6 roll is less than 3, you may instead deal 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: WEAPON MASTER
special_powers.description: Zaran can use Close Combat Expert and Ranged Combat Expert.

special_powers.name: AS MY KING COMMANDS
special_powers.description: When an adjacent friendly character named Black Panther makes a close attack, after actions resolve W'Kabi can make a close attack.

special_powers.name: HONORED ADVISOR
special_powers.description: W'Kabi can use Toughness. UNIQUE MODIFIER - Friendly characters with the Wakanda keyword modify their defense values by +1.

special_powers.name: SACRIFICE FOR THE HAND
special_powers.description: STOP - Kirigi can use Combat Reflexes. Once per game, give Kirigi a free action and deal 1 penetrating damage to each adjacent friendly character with The Hand keyword. When you do, heal Kirigi 1 click of damage for each click of damage dealt. Each time one or more adjacent characters is KO'd by this effect, Kirigi can use this effect an additional time.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: ELEKTRA
special_powers.description: Give Elektra a free action if she began your turn on the map. Replace her with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: MARVEL KNIGHTS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose one: Characters using this trait have a minimum attack value of 10 or characters using this trait are wild cards.

special_powers.name: DANCE OF DEATH
special_powers.description: Give Elektra a close combat action to make any number of close attacks, each targeting an adjacent opposing character that wasn't already targeted during this action.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: DR. STRANGE
special_powers.description: Give Dr. Strange a free action if he began your turn on the map. Replace him with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: DEFENDERS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, if a character uses the Defenders team ability to replace its defense value with Dr. Strange's, modify that character's defense value by +1 if it has the Defenders keyword.

special_powers.name: MYSTICAL GUIDANCE
special_powers.description: Dr. Strange can use Empower and Enhancement. UNIQUE MODIFIER - When he uses either, also modify the attacker's attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: IT'S NOT JUST A SWORD!
special_powers.description: Swordsman can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. Before making a close attack, choose one effect for the attack: Swordsman uses Blades/Claws/Fangs and he damage dealt is penetrating damage; the hit target is given an action token; -or- the hit target can't be moved or placed until your next turn.

special_powers.name: MARVEL KNIGHTS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose one: Characters using this trait have a minimum attack value of 10 or characters using this trait are wild cards.

special_powers.name: DAREDEVIL'S PARTNER
special_powers.description: Black Widow can use Stealth.

special_powers.name: MARVEL KNIGHTS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose one: Characters using this trait have a minimum attack value of 10 or characters using this trait are wild cards.

special_powers.name: THEY ALWAYS LEAVE CLUES
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 6 squares can't use Stealth.

special_powers.name: ONCE A VICTIM, ALWAYS MINE TO CONTROL
special_powers.description: Purple Man considers opposing characters with Pheromone tokens to be adjacent and have a 0 point value for Mastermind purposes.

special_powers.name: MAKE YOU DO WHATEVER I WANT
special_powers.description: Purple Man can use Mind Control. When he does, modify his attack value by +3, he doesn't take feedback damage for using it and hit characters are given a Pheromone token.

special_powers.name: SURROUNDED BY WILLING VICTIMS
special_powers.description: Purple Man can use Mastermind. When he does, he may remove a Pheromone token from an opposing character to transfer damage to that character.

special_powers.name: IONIC RESERVES
special_powers.description: Count Nefaria can use Invulnerability and Regeneration. When he uses Regeneration and has one action token, he doesn't subtract 2 from the d6 roll.

special_powers.name: KINGPIN OF LOS ANGELES
special_powers.description: Count Nefaria can use Leadership and Stealth.

special_powers.name: TRUST ME... I'M A LAWYER
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, choose a friendly character of 150 points or less. Until your next turn as long as the chosen character is adjacent to Foggy Nelson, they cannot have their powers countered or their combat values decreased by opposing game effects.

special_powers.name: TITANIUM SAWBLADE GAUNTLETS
special_powers.description: Gladiator can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When he hits a single opposing character with a range attack, he may roll a d6 and replace his damage value with the result and that value is locked.

special_powers.name: BLADE MASTER
special_powers.description: Machete can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When he does and hits, instead roll 2d6 and choose one to be the result.

special_powers.name: DEFENDERS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, if a character uses the Defenders team ability to replace its defense value with Gargoyle's, that character can use Probability Control during this attack.

special_powers.name: DEFENDERS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, if a character uses the Defenders team ability to replace its defense value with Nighthawk's, that character can choose to reroll 1 of the dice in the attack roll.

special_powers.name: DEFENDER OF THE NIGHT
special_powers.description: Nighthawk can use Charge, Flurry and Stealth.

special_powers.name: ENHANCED METABOLISM
special_powers.description: The Owl can use Toughness.

special_powers.name: GLIDE
special_powers.description: The Owl can use Charge and the Flight ability.

special_powers.name: DEFENDERS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, if a character uses the Defenders team ability to replace its defense value with Hellcat's, that character can use Super Senses during this attack.

special_powers.name: IT'S PATSY!
special_powers.description: Hellcat can use Empower. While a friendly character named Jessica Jones is attacking, Hellcat can use Probability Control.

special_powers.name: RED, WHITE, AND BLUE PILLS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose one pill type: Red Pill - This turn, Nuke can use Battle Fury and modifies his attack value by +1. White Pill - Heal Nuke 1 click and he can't attack this turn. Blue Pill - Nuke can use Precision Strike this turn.

special_powers.name: RAZOR-TIPPED QUILLS
special_powers.description: When Porcupine is hit with a close attack, after actions resolve deal the attacker 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: ZEY CALL ME... ZE LEE-PAIR!
special_powers.description: Batroc can use Sidestep. When he has one action token, he may use Sidestep twice this turn and may be given a free action to make a close attack.

special_powers.name: CONTINUITY
special_powers.description: When Dr. Strange, Earth's Guardian is KO'd, after actions resolve deal 2 unavoidable damage to the friendly character occupying a square closest to the square Dr. Strange, Earth's Guardian last occupied.

special_powers.name: EVERY SCRAP OF HIDDEN SORCERY
special_powers.description: Modify Dr. Strange, Earth's Guardian's or an adjacent friendly character's damage value by +1 this turn.

special_powers.name: THE LAST DAYS OF MAGIC
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters can use the Mystics team ability until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SORCERER SUPREME
special_powers.description: For the rest of the game, as long as Dr. Strange, Earth's Guardian is on the map you may reroll an attack roll each turn.

special_powers.name: BATTLING MONSTERS!
special_powers.description: When Hulk hits an opposing character with the Monster keyword or with a printed damage value of 4 or more, after actions resolve remove an action token from him.

special_powers.name: BEST HULK EVER!
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Super Strength. When he KO's an opposing character, heal him a number of clicks equal to the damage that would have been taken minus the actual damage taken.

special_powers.name: OK, 8TH SMARTEST
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Outwit. If no friendly character has a power or ability countered, he can also use Perplex.

special_powers.name: ALL MY DIFFERENT ARMORS MERGED INTO ONE
special_powers.description: Give Iron Man a free action and choose any two standard powers, except defense powers. Until your next turn, he can use the chosen powers but can't use his possessed standard speed, attack, or damage powers.

special_powers.name: USE MY ARMOR TO IMPRISON YOU
special_powers.description: Give Iron Man a power action and choose an opposing character within 3 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn that character can't move or make a range attack and Iron Man can't use Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: AVENGERS UNIFIER
special_powers.description: Once per turn, when a friendly character is healed, after actions resolve you may roll a d6. On a result of 4-6 remove an action token from that character.

special_powers.name: NOT FIELD LEADER, BUT YOU BETTER LISTEN
special_powers.description: Captain America can use Outwit and Perplex. He can use Leadership as if he was 200 points.

special_powers.name: DEFENDERS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, if a character uses the Defenders team ability to replace its defense value with Man-Thing's, that character can reduce penetrating damage and attacks targeting this character using Mind Control automatically miss this turn.

special_powers.name: POSSESSED BY THE SIX-FINGERED HAND
special_powers.description: Man-Thing has the Giant symbol, a range value of 5 and can use Sidestep. This can't be countered.

special_powers.name: TAKEN POSSESSION OF A MINDLESS HUSK
special_powers.description: STOP.

special_powers.name: DEFENDERS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, if a chaarcter uses the Defenders team ability to replace it's defense value with Moondragon's, put an Arrogant token on this card. Moondragon modifies her attack and damage values by +1 for each Arrogant token on this card. When Moondragon misses any targets of an attack, after actions resolve remove all Arrogant tokens from this card.

special_powers.name: LEARNED MY LESSON IN HUMILITY
special_powers.description: Moondragon can use Mind Control with 3 targets and doesn't take feedback damage when using it.

special_powers.name: MY FORMIDABLE PSIONIC POWERS
special_powers.description: Moondragon can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast and Telekinesis.

special_powers.name: PLEASE ESCORT THIS MAN OUT OF MY OFFICE
special_powers.description: When Kingpin takes damage, he takes a maximum of 1 damage unless he is the only character on your force.

special_powers.name: EVERYONE HAS A WEAKNESS...
special_powers.description: Kingpin can use Leadership. Give Kingpin a power action and choose a friendly character that shares a keyword within 8 squares; the chosen character can use Exploit weakness this turn.

special_powers.name: HIGHEST AUTHORITY IN THE LAND
special_powers.description: Friendly characters with the Wakanda keyword modify their attack values by +1.

special_powers.name: SACRED RULER OF WAKANDA
special_powers.description: Black Panther can use Leadership, but succeeds on a 4-6. When he does and succeeds, after actions resolve you may place a #AD014 Wakanda Warrior from outside the game in an adjacent square with an action token. On a result of: 4 That character begins on click #3. 5 That character begins on click #2. 6 That character begins on click #1 and doesn't receive an action token.

special_powers.name: HARD LIGHT FOCUSED VIBRANIUM CONDUIT
special_powers.description: Give Klaw a free action and choose a standard attack power. Klaw can use that power this turn.

special_powers.name: SOUND TRAVELS!
special_powers.description: Klaw can use Sidestep and Improved Movement: Hindering, Blocking, Characters. When he uses Sidestep, you may roll a d6 and he may move up to the result instead of 2.

special_powers.name: CAN'T HURT WHAT'S MADE OF SOUND!
special_powers.description: Klaw can use Super Senses. If Klaw would take more than 2 damage, he takes 2 damage instead.

special_powers.name: MELD THE DARK DIMENSION WITH YOURS
special_powers.description: Give Dormammu and Loki a free action to remove an object within 8 squares from the game and place a Mindless One bystander in that square. Once per turn, when an opposing character is replaced, brought onto the map from an opponent's sideline, or one or more opposing bystanders are brought into the game after the beginning of the game, after actions resolve you may place a Mindless One bystander adjacent to Dormammu and Loki.

special_powers.name: MY MINDLESS MINIONS
special_powers.description: When another friendly character of 25 or more points is KO'd, after actions resolve you may place a Mindless One bystander in their square.

special_powers.name: POWER STRUGGLE FOR THE EVIL EYE
special_powers.description: When Dormammu and Loki miss an attack and have no action tokens, after actions resolve give them an action token.

special_powers.name: MYSTICISM OF THE WHITE APE
special_powers.description: Man-Ape can use Steal Energy. When Man-Ape KO's an opposing character of 50 points or more, after actions resolve remove an action token from him.

special_powers.name: PROTECTOR OF NIGHT TRAVELERS
special_powers.description: Once per turn, if another friendly character is damaged from an attack, after actions resolve, remove an action token from Moon Knight. Whenever a friendly character is KO'd from an attack, after actions resolve, you may place Moon Knight in a square that character occupied.

special_powers.name: MOON DARTS AND BLOODIED FISTS
special_powers.description: Moon Knight can use Charge and Running Shot.

special_powers.name: MY LIFE, COURTESY OF KHONSHU
special_powers.description: STOP. Moon Knight can use Regeneration and Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: ANT-MAN SECURITY SOLUTIONS
special_powers.description: Ant-Man can use Sidestep and Stealth. When an adjacent opposing character is moved or placed, you may place Ant-Man adjacent to that character after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: SUBATOMIC SUBTERFUGE
special_powers.description: Ant-Man can use Perplex. When he does, if he targets an opposing character, that character can't target Ant-Man until your next turn unless it's the only character on it's force.

special_powers.name: MARVEL KNIGHTS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose one: Characters using this trait have a minimum attack value of 10 or characters using this trait are wild cards.

special_powers.name: VENGEANCE WILL NOT BE DENIED
special_powers.description: Ghost Rider can use Sidestep. Give Ghost Rider a power action to move up to his speed value in a direct path. After actions resolve, choose: 3 damage or 2 penetrating damage, then make a close attack targeting all characters he moved through. Hit characters are dealt the chosen damage instead of normal damage and placed into a square that Ghost Rider did not move through adjacent to their current square.

special_powers.name: DEFENDERS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, if a character uses the Defenders team ability to replace its defense value with Valkyrie's, heal that character 1 click after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: ARAGORN, TO BATTLE!
special_powers.description: Give Valkyrie a power action to move in a direct path using Improved Movement: Characters. After actions resolve, make a close attack targeting all characters she moved through. Valkyrie can use Blades/Claws/Fangs for this attack, and if she does, roll a d6 for each hit character. These d6 rolls can't be rerolled.

special_powers.name: DEFENDERS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, if a character uses the Defenders team ability to replace its defense value with Black Knight's, heal Black Knight 1 click of damage after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: ATOMIC STEED, EBONY BLADE
special_powers.description: Give Black Knight a power action to move in a direct path using Improved Movement: Characters. After actions resolve, make a close attack using Exploit Weakness targeting all characters he moved through.

special_powers.name: RAPID-FIRE TRICK SHOOTING
special_powers.description: Hawkeye can use Running Shot. Each time Hawkeye hits an opposing character with a range attack, after actions resolve, he can use Running Shot again as a free action, but only to target a character that wasn't attacked this turn.

special_powers.name: LEADER OF THE HAND
special_powers.description: Daredevil can use Stealth. Once per turn, give Daredevil a power action to place a #adw015 Hand Ninja from outside the game in a square of hindering terrain within range and line of fire. If a friendly character with The Hand keyword was KO'd since your last turn, this is a free action instead.

special_powers.name: DEMONIC APPETITE FOR PAIN
special_powers.description: Daredevil can use Precision Strike. When Daredevil hits an opposing character, modify the attack values of all friendly characters with The Hand keyword by +1 this turn. If the opposing character is KO'd, also modify their damage values by +1 this turn.

special_powers.name: MYSTICAL SENSES
special_powers.description: Daredevil can use Super Senses. When he does and succeeds, after actions resolve deal the attacker 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: WWII PILOT
special_powers.description: If Captain America is being carried, modify the carrying character's speed value by +3. If Captain America has no action tokens, she can be given a non-free action after being carried.

special_powers.name: I BROUGHT THE ARMORY, FRANK
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, choose an adjacent friendly character and two of the following powers: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Energy Explosion, Penetrating/Psychic Blast, Precision Strike, and Ranged Combat Expert. Until the end of your turn, Rachel Cole-Alves can use the first power chosen and the chosen character can use second chosen power as long as it is adjacent to Rachel Cole-Alves.

special_powers.name: I TOOK MY HUSBAND'S NAME
special_powers.description: Rachel Cole-Alves is considered to be named Punisher for all game effects, even when she is off the map. Once per game, when Rachel Cole-Alves would be KO'd, instead turn her to Click #6.

special_powers.name: ARMOR'S FALLING APART ON ME
special_powers.description: Iron Heart begins the game with 1 Broken Armor token. When she is dealt damage, instead roll a d6 that can't be rerolled. If the result is equal to or less than the number of Broken Armor tokens, she is KO'd. If not, turn her to that click number and give her another Broken Armor token. This can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: WHO ELSE IS SECRETLY WITH ME?
special_powers.description: During force construction, characters that have the Avengers keyword also have the Hydra keyword. Other friendly characters with the Avengers keyword can use the Hydra team ability.

special_powers.name: ANOTHER UNEXPECTED BETRAYAL
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character. Whenever that character hits Captain America with an attack, roll a d6. If the result is a 4-6, that attack deals no damage to Captain America and for the rest of the game don't roll for this ability again.

special_powers.name: RAGE FOR A DEAD WORLD
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Super Strength and the Colossal Stamina ability. When Hulk is damaged by an attack, increase his combat values by +1 until he clears action tokens.

special_powers.name: YOU CAN'T HIDE FROM ME
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Charge and Improved Movement: Characters, Destroy Blocking. When he uses Charge, he doesn't halve his speed value.

special_powers.name: KNOCK DOWN THE CITY
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Quake, but his damage value becomes his printed damage value instead of 2.

special_powers.name: RAGE FOR A DEAD WIFE
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Impervious and his powers and abilities can't be countered.

special_powers.name: ANTIMATTER WARP CORE EXPLOSION
special_powers.description: STOP. Hulk can use Battle Fury.

special_powers.name: CHOSEN OF THE PANTHER GOD
special_powers.description: Black Panther can use Sidestep and Stealth.

special_powers.name: VIBRANIUM WEAVE UNIFORM
special_powers.description: Black Panther can use Combat Reflexes and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: CUNNING RULER
special_powers.description: Black Panther can use Outwit. When she does, she may also decrease the defense value of that character by 1 until her next turn.

special_powers.name: THE NEW PROTECTOR OF HELL'S KITCHEN
special_powers.description: The Man Without Fear can use Stealth. At the end of your turn, if The Man Without Fear occupies printed hindering terrain, you may heal him 1 click.

special_powers.name: THEY MUST STILL FEAR THE DEVIL FROM THE DARKNESS
special_powers.description: The Man Without Fear can use Sidestep. If The Man Without Fear occupies printed hindering terrain, he can use Hypersonic Speed with a locked speed value of 6, but if he doesn't end his movement in a square of hindering terrain, deal him one unavoidable damage after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: Special Rules
special_powers.description: Squares bordered by (orange solid line) are Void terrain. Squares bordered by (orange dotted line) are Portals. Both are considered clear terrain for movement and line of fire purposes. After any action resolves, the active player rolls a d6 for each character occupying Void terrain and places them in the portal square with the number matching the result. If the character can't be placed in that square, place them in a square nearest to that square.

special_powers.name: Thick Jungle
special_powers.description: Hindered lines of fire drawn through printed hindering terrain modify a target's defense value by +2 instead of +1.
